equipment.itemName: Visit of the Shining Butterfly Platinum [35Lv]

options.explain:
Clear Cube Fragment skills add 2 Wrathful Energy for every Clear Cube Fragment consumed.
- Super Armor while Wrathful Energy lasts
- Wrathful Energy decreases 10 every sec.
- Max Wrathful Energy +10 per additional Wrath equipment equipped

Dashing adds 10 Wrathful Energy. 
Wrathful Energy doesn't decrease at 100% or higher Movement Speed.

Wrathful Energy applies the following effects for 10 sec.
- Movement Speed +4%
- Consumables, equipment, and skills' HP healing amounts +10% at 40% or more MP
options.explainDetail:
Clear Cube Fragment skills add 2 Wrathful Energy for every Clear Cube Fragment consumed. (Up to +35)
- Super Armor while Wrathful Energy lasts
- Wrathful Energy decreases 10 every sec.
- Max Wrathful Energy +10 per additional Wrath equipment equipped

Dashing adds 10 Wrathful Energy. (Cooldown: 1 sec.) 
Wrathful Energy doesn't decrease at 100% or higher Movement Speed.

Wrathful Energy applies the following effects for 10 sec.
- Movement Speed +4%
- Consumables, equipment, and skills' HP healing amounts +10% at 40% or more MP

options.explain:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects.
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks randomly drop a thunderbolt within 300 px around you, creating the following effects. (Cooldown: 10 sec. Inflicts 21% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Shocks enemies for 15 sec.
- Shocks you for 15 sec. (This Shock effect can't be removed by skills or Consumables, and ignores your Shock Tolerance.)
